Aaron Sequeira
Software/AI Engineer & Consultant

Profile
Full-Stack AI Engineer and Technical Consultant specializing in architecting and deploying end-to-end intelligent applications.
Proven expertise in building scalable backend systems, implementing MLOps pipelines, and leveraging Generative AI (RAG,
LLMs) to solve complex business problems and to drive digital transformation from concept to production.
Education
B-Tech in Information Technology Manipal University Jaipur, India 2021-2025
CGPA: 7.93 Relevant Courses: OOPs, Data Structures & Analysis of Algorithms, Machine Learning, Web Technologies.
Senior Secondary education Birla Public School Doha, Qatar 2008-2021
Class 12th: 90.6% — Class 10: 89.6%
Professional Experience
Full Stack AI/ML Developer (Remote) Smarter.Codes Remote 12/25 - Present
• Building end-to-end web applications for clients (Uber, Ford, Target) that integrate NLP, web crawling, and RPA to automate data
extraction and customer interactions for global enterprise projects.
AI Researcher (Contract) Wood Engineering Qatar Doha, Qatar 12/25 - Present
• Training ML models for CML asset life optimization using TensorFlow/PyTorch/MATLAB with 2100+ sample dataset, building
custom AI bots to extract relevant data fast; cutting down time by 97%. Delivering a RAG-based internal document search system
using LangChain/LlamaIndex with vector DBs (Qdrant) to cut document retrieval time by 65%.
Software Engineer Lanco Engineering: Mannai Corporation (Client) Doha, Qatar 10/25 - 12/25
• Developing and integrating AI-driven monitoring for the Border Information System, enhancing security across +1100 AXIS
PTZ/Fixed cameras managed via Milestone VMS & Ipsotek, while deploying computer vision models (YOLO/TensorFlow)
in Docker containers for real-time object detection and violation analysis, while reducing false alerts by 11%.
Software Engineering Intern Baker Hughes Pune, India 09/24 - 09/25
• Architected and deployed a Technical Service Portal & Laboratory Management System for Pune & Celle Tech Center using
Microsoft Power Platform, automating key workflows which reduced service downtime by 70%, with ensuring real-time tracking,
auditing, and accelerated compliance validation by 40%. Tools: Power Platform, Microsoft 365 Dynamics. Engineered an
end-to-end LLM-powered document intelligence system using a RAG architecture, cutting manual data entry by 75%. Deployed the
solution via a CI/CD pipeline on Azure. Tools: Python, React, LangChain, Azure AI, Docker.

• AI/ML: LLMs, RAG, LangChain, Prompt Engineering,

LAB

script, C#, SQL, Bash, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Qdrant

Platform

Key Projects and Merits

Awarded for an IoT & AI project revolutionizing urban traffic management. Best Prototype Award, ACM Student
Club Mini Hacks 2.0: Won for a Smart Home Energy Saving project using C# and .NET, featuring an IoT dashboard
with real-time data visualization and a custom automation rules engine.
